title: MBMBaM 515: Viscous Bod
description:
In today’s episode, we inexplicably relitigate the film Titanic, which is a million years old, and come up with a way cooler ending where the ship doesn’t break and the cool guy gets the treasure and everyone gets married. (Feat. Special Guestpert, Dr. James Bufeè!)

Suggested talking points: Half-Virile Knight, Poster Prank, Having Fun While Shopping at Sears, A Hearty Bod Jam, We Fix Titanic Again, Home Summer Vibes, The Big Pumpkin

Support the Foundation for Black Women’s Wellness here: http://ffbww.org/

More resources on anti-racism and fighting police violence: https://blacklivesmatters.carrd.co/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
